texto: against applicable objectives (see 7.3) and their pre-determined criteria. Where objectives have not been achieved, the cause(s) should be investigated, with appropriate reviews of the deployment of the organization’s policies, strategy and objectives and the organization’s managing of resources, as necessary. Similarly, when objectives have been exceeded, what made it possible should be analysed in order to maintain the performance. The results of evaluation should be understood by top management.
